pageContent: Objective: Increased long-term survival rates have led to a greater focus on the health-related quality of life (HRQL) of prostate cancer survivors. This study assessed the motivations of prostate cancer survivors for disclosing their diagnosis and treatment to close others, and their perceptions of their own and others' responses to the disclosure.

metaData.source:
Why do patients regret their prostate cancer treatment? A systematic review of regret after treatment for localized prostate cancer
